name: any-website-search
title: Universal Website Search
description: Search any site on the web
author: bert

commands.name: search-any-site
commands.title: Search Websites
commands.description: Select the site-to-search from the dropdown, enter your search term, and choose from the list of search suggestions. Use the "Manage sites" action to add, edit, or delete saved sites.

preferences.name: searchSuggestionsProvider
preferences.label: Search Suggestions
preferences.title: Search Suggestions
preferences.description: The search engine to fetch search suggestions from, or none if you don't want search suggestions

preferences.name: prefillFromClipboard
preferences.title: Other Settings
preferences.label: Prefill search from clipboard
preferences.description: Whether to pre-fill the search field with the text on the clipboard, if any

preferences.name: interpretDdgBangs
preferences.label: Strip DuckDuckGo's "bangs" for search suggestions
preferences.description: If enabled, if the selected search site's URL looks like it's DuckDuckGo and the query starts with a "bang" (https://duckduckgo.com/bang), then the bang will be removed when fetching search suggestions. Tl;dr you probably want this disabled if getting search suggestions from DuckDuckGo and enabled otherwise. See the README for more info.
